block.p: American League BOSTON RED SOX--Optioned LHP Javier Lopez to Pawtucket (IL). Activated RHP Mike Timlin from the 15-day DL. Designated RHP J.D. Durbin for assignment. SEATTLE MARINERS--Placed LHP Arthur Rhodes on the 15-day DL, retroactive to April 1. Recalled LHP Jake Woods from Tacoma (PCL). TEXAS RANGERS--Purchased the contract of RHP Jamey Wright from Frisco (Texas). Optioned RHP Mike Wood to Oklahoma (PCL). Designated LHP Daniel Haigwood for assignment.
National League SAN DIEGO PADRES--Agreed to terms with RHP Chris Young on a four-year contract.
NBA--Fined Charlotte F Adam Morrison $25,000 for making an obscene gesture to fans during a game on April 8.
NBA Development League NBADL--Awarded an expansion franchise to Fort Wayne, Ind. for the 2007-08 season.

NFL--Suspended Tennessee CB Adam Jones for the 2007 season, without pay, and Cincinnati WR Chris Henry for the first eight games of the 2007 regular season, without pay, for violating the personal conduct policy and engaging in conduct detrimental to the league. GREEN BAY PACKERS--Signed LB Nick Barnett to a contract extension. NEW YORK GIANTS--Signed K Marc Hickok and P Cory Ohnesorge. TAMPA BAY BUCCANEERS--Released DT Lance Legree.

BOSTON BRUINS--Assigned LW Jeff Hoggan, RW Peter Kalus and C Nate Thompson to Providence of the AHL. CAROLINA HURRICANES--Signed C Bobby Hughes to a three-year contract. MONTREAL CANADIENS--Signed G Carey Price to a three-year contract. Assigned F Maxim Lapierre and F Andrei Kostitsyn to Hamilton (AHL). PHOENIX COYOTES--Announced the resignation of Barry Smith, associate coach, to become coach and director of hockey operations for SKA St. Petersburg (Russian Elite).

DEPAUL--Named Erica Westrich women's assistant soccer coach. IONA--Named Kevin Willard men's basketball coach. LONG ISLAND U.--Named Sarah Chlenaba assistant volleyball coach and Katrina English director of volleyball operations. MERCER--Named Janell Jones women's basketball coach. MICHIGAN--Named Kevin Borseth women's basketball coach. ST. BONAVENTURE--Named Mark Schmidt men's basketball coach. TEXAS--Announced freshman G-F Kevin Durant is making himself available for the NBA draft. TEXAS A&M--Named Mark Turgeon men's basketball coach.
